title: PS5 Teardown Surprise!
description: The Sony PS5 receives the full teardown treatment: liquid metal and all! Unboxing the PS5 DualSense controller:  Xbox Series X unboxing and review:   My new podcast @TheBackmarkers!  Our second channel @thisis!  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
